CustomField.description: A base64 value of the output of Crypto.generateAesKey(256) This can be any valid key and is use to encrypt and hash the state for the purpose of creation PKCE challenge and verifier values. NOTE: This is only used to create a secure hash, it is not used to encrypt/decrypt and sensitive personal information. The final encrypted value is hashed so it can't be decrypted anyway.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A base64 value of the output of Crypto.generateAesKey(256) This can be any valid key and is use to encrypt and hash the state for the purpose of creation PKCE challenge and verifier values.
CustomField.label: PKCE Encryption Key
